name: Rain of Flames
summary: Rain of Flames is an endless runner platformer. Which means the fun never ends (this can be a good thing and a bad thing). Rain of Flames is a game about a little dude name Larry and he has to escape the end of the world by running and dodging falling planets that are falling down. There are many options for the game such as an Easy mode a Normal mode and a Hard mode. Since every game needs a hard mode. Rain of Flames is available now on Windows/Macs/Android and Linux. Consume our product please.
